name: glycyrrhetaldehyde,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (30-hydroxylating)
definition: Glycyrrhetaldehyde + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> Glycyrrhetinate + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the last step of three-step reaction (see R10316, R10313+R10314+R10315)
